perturbation.original_text:
6. REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES

A. Each party represents and warrants that it has the right, title, interest and authority to enter into this Agreement and to fully perform its obligations hereunder, and that the rights granted hereunder shall not violate the rights of any third party. Each party represents and warrants that its conduct hereunder shall conform to all applicable federal, state and local law and regulation.

B. Both parties will not have liability for any damages other than direct damages. Both parties DO NOT MAKE ANY WARRANTY REGARDING THE QUALITY OF ITS SERVICES. Both parties DO NOT MAKE ANY WARRANTY THAT ALL ERRORS OR FAILURES IN ITS WEBSITES WILL BE CORRECTED. Both parties EXPRESSLY DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. BEYOND THE WARRANTIES CONTAINED IN THIS PARAGRAPH, Both parties DO  NOT WARRANT THAT their SITES ARE ERROR-FREE OR THAT OPERATION OF their SITES WILL BE SECURE OR UNINTERRUPTED. THESE LIMITATIONS SHALL SURVIVE AND APPLY NOTWITHSTANDING THE VALIDITY OF THE LIMITED REMEDIES PROVIDED FOR IN THIS AGREEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text:
6. REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES

A. Each party represents and warrants that it has the right, title, interest and authority to enter into this Agreement and to fully perform its obligations hereunder, and that the rights granted hereunder shall not violate the rights of any third party.

B. Both parties will not have liability for any damages other than direct damages. Both parties DO NOT MAKE ANY WARRANTY REGARDING THE QUALITY OF ITS SERVICES. Both parties DO NOT MAKE ANY WARRANTY THAT ALL ERRORS OR FAILURES IN ITS WEBSITES WILL BE CORRECTED. Both parties EXPRESSLY DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. BEYOND THE WARRANTIES CONTAINED IN THIS PARAGRAPH, Both parties DO  NOT WARRANT THAT their SITES ARE ERROR-FREE OR THAT OPERATION OF their SITES WILL BE SECURE OR UNINTERRUPTED. THESE LIMITATIONS SHALL SURVIVE AND APPLY NOTWITHSTANDING THE VALIDITY OF THE LIMITED REMEDIES PROVIDED FOR IN THIS AGREEMENT.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the warranty that 'Each party represents and warrants that its conduct hereunder shall conform to all applicable federal, state and local law and regulation' introduces a significant legal risk. By removing this statement, the agreement no longer explicitly commits both parties to abide by all relevant laws and regulations, potentially violating consumer protection laws or other regulatory requirements applicable to healthcare and data privacy. The parties may be engaging in business practices that violate federal or state laws.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Various federal and state laws, including but not limited to HIPAA, consumer protection laws, and relevant state business regulations.

perturbation.original_text: ●IMedicor will make its records available for audit purposes at any time by USA MCO during regular business hours at the headquarters of iMedicor.
perturbation.changed_text: ●IMedicor will make its records available for audit purposes with two weeks prior written notice by USA MCO.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the condition of when IMedicor's records are available for audit removes the immediacy, flexibility, and potentially the thoroughness of the audit. The new requirement of providing 'two weeks prior written notice by USA MCO' limits the ability of USA MCO to conduct an unscheduled audit in the case of suspected malfeasance. The immediate right to audit ensures compliance with consumer and data protection laws. The omission creates a contradiction with laws designed to protect data by allowing enough leeway for illicit action to happen without being caught immediately.
perturbation.contradicted_law: State and federal regulations for audit compliance

perturbation.original_text: All revenue sharing will be reconciled monthly and funds distributed by the 20th of each month by wire transfer for all net collected revenues for the previous month (net of returns and refunds, if any).
perturbation.changed_text: Revenue sharing will be reconciled and funds distributed at the discretion of IMedicor.
perturbation.explanation: By changing the terms to make it so that revenue sharing would be paid based on 'the discretion of IMedicor' removes the obligation of a monthly payment and makes the payment optional. A set date is designed to protect USA MCO and prevent IMedicor from withholding rightfully earned revenues. This creates a contradiction with business and contract laws that necessitate payments be sent on time, as well as opening a potential legal risk for IMedicor for delaying/refusing payment.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract and business laws concerning timely payment
